original_title: Under the Bridge: 25 Years of Fighting for Burnside Skatepark
overview: 25 years ago a group of bored skateboarders took a bag of stolen concrete underneath the Burnside Bridge and built a small bank up against itâ€™s back wall. Without knowing it, they would change the face of skateboarding, creating an international landmark skaters pilgrimage to every day. Since that day, the same guys who built it have been fighting to keep it around.
title: Under the Bridge: 25 Years of Fighting for Burnside Skatepark
